27#ifndef _SYS_FASTTRAP_H
28#define _SYS_FASTTRAP_H
29
30#pragma ident "%Z%%M% %I% %E% SMI"
31
32#include <sys/fasttrap_isa.h>
33#include <sys/dtrace.h>
34#include <sys/types.h>
35
36#ifdef __cplusplus
37extern "C" {
38#endif
39
40#ifdef illumos
41#define FASTTRAPIOC (('m' << 24) | ('r' << 16) | ('f' << 8))
42#define FASTTRAPIOC_MAKEPROBE (FASTTRAPIOC | 1)
43#define FASTTRAPIOC_GETINSTR (FASTTRAPIOC | 2)
44#else
45#define FASTTRAPIOC_GETINSTR _IOWR('f', 2, uint8_t)
46#define FASTTRAPIOC_MAKEPROBE _IO('f', 3)
47#endif
48
49typedef enum fasttrap_probe_type {
50 DTFTP_NONE = 0,
51 DTFTP_ENTRY,
52 DTFTP_RETURN,
53 DTFTP_OFFSETS,
54 DTFTP_POST_OFFSETS,
55 DTFTP_IS_ENABLED
56} fasttrap_probe_type_t;
57
58typedef struct fasttrap_probe_spec {
59 pid_t ftps_pid;
60 fasttrap_probe_type_t ftps_type;
61
62 char ftps_func[DTRACE_FUNCNAMELEN];
63 char ftps_mod[DTRACE_MODNAMELEN];
64
65 uint64_t ftps_pc;
66 uint64_t ftps_size;
67 uint64_t ftps_noffs;
68 uint64_t ftps_offs[1];
69} fasttrap_probe_spec_t;
70
71typedef struct fasttrap_instr_query {
72 uint64_t ftiq_pc;
73 pid_t ftiq_pid;
74 fasttrap_instr_t ftiq_instr;
75} fasttrap_instr_query_t;
76
77/*
78 * To support the fasttrap provider from very early in a process's life,
79 * the run-time linker, ld.so.1, has a program header of type PT_SUNWDTRACE
80 * which points to a data object which must be PT_SUNWDTRACE_SIZE bytes.
81 * This structure mimics the fasttrap provider section of the ulwp_t structure.
82 * When the fasttrap provider is changed to require new or different
83 * instructions, the data object in ld.so.1 and the thread initializers in libc
84 * (libc_init() and _thrp_create()) need to be updated to include the new
85 * instructions, and PT_SUNWDTRACE needs to be changed to a new unique number
86 * (while the old value gets assigned something like PT_SUNWDTRACE_1). Since the
87 * linker must be backward compatible with old Solaris releases, it must have
88 * program headers for each of the PT_SUNWDTRACE versions. The kernel's
89 * elfexec() function only has to look for the latest version of the
90 * PT_SUNWDTRACE program header.
91 */
92#define PT_SUNWDTRACE_SIZE FASTTRAP_SUNWDTRACE_SIZE
93
94#ifdef __cplusplus
95}
96#endif
97
98#endif /* _SYS_FASTTRAP_H */
99
